item.title: org-brain
item.description: org-brain org-brain is mind mapping software based on emacs. It provides the user with a way of scaffolding ideas within the terminal. scaffolding 6 Scaffolding Strategies to Use With Your Students | Edutopia 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 scaffolding Breaking up the learning into chunks and providing a tool, or structure, with each chunk. When scaffolding reading, for example, you might preview the text and discuss key vocabulary, or chunk the text and then read and discuss as you go.

item.title: About
item.description: Infogetics is a GitHub organisation that maps software for transforming one type of information into another with the aim of developing an augmented intelligence sensorium. Here’s some art http://kinetecharts.org/ai-sensorium Shane Mulligan Website: Bodacious Blog GitHub: https://github.com/mullikine/ CV: https://mullikine.github.io/cv/ TakaheAI Website http://takaheai.github.io/
